column4: hi all. i've posted a thread in ubuntu forums, but still struggling. can anyone take a look at it and maybe comment? http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=576844&posted=1#post576844
need more information than that.  for example, are these boxes on the same network? how are you trying to connect? etc.
they're on the same network yes
the wlan on the server is a different subnet from the eth0, and the wlan on the client is on the same subnet as the wlan on server
